title: Gemini-the most powerful LLM: Myth or Truth

authors.name: Imtiaz Ahmed
affiliations: New Mexico Institute of Mining and Technology

authors.name: Raisa Islam
affiliations: New Mexico Institute of Mining and Technology

abstract: Gemini models excel in various tasks including image generation and interpretation, video understanding, and solving mathematical problems, among others. The Vertex AI Gemini API and Google AI Gemini API both enable developers to integrate Gemini model functionalities into their applications. This paper offers a concise summary of the Gemini Framework, focusing on its distinctive modalities that distinguish it from current systems. In our research, we explored the details of its architecture, pointing out the innovative strategies employed to improve generative AI capabilities. Furthermore, we conduct a comparative study, assessing Geminiâ€™s performance against other top generative AI models.

institutions.name: New Mexico Institute of Mining and Technology
